name: Mugen, Infinity
description:
Share your generations with us in our Discord server!

Mugen ∞ is an NSFW-prone, full purpose 2D and 2.5D anime/semi-realistic model that accepts a mixture of normal prompting and dan/gelbooru tags.

The current recipe is a little fuzzy to me but I have a rough idea:

Mugen v1
ChilloutMix + Kenshi + SD1.5 @ Add difference 1 = MugenBase
MugenBase + Guweiz @ Weighted sum 0.3 = MugenGuweiz
wlop + BoChen03 @ Weighted sum 0.3 = wlopBoChen03Merge
MugenGuweiz + wlopBoChen03Merge @ Weighted sum 0.25 = MugenGuWLOPBoChen03
MugenGuWLOPBoChen03 + Guweiz (again) @ Weighted sum 0.25 = Mugen v1
-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
Mugen v2 -- Current model
Mugen v1 + SardonyxREDUX @ Weighted sum 0.25 = Mugen v1.1
Mugen v1.1 + PerfectDeliberate @ Weighted sum 0.25 = Mugen v2
-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

Anything V4 VAE is baked into the model.

All images generated at 512x512. Hires fix @ 1.5x Upscale (4x_UltraSharp), 0.45 Denoising strength, 15 steps, and then upscaled 4x with 4x_fatal_Anime_50000_G and 4x_UltraSharp, which can be found here.

🛠🚧🏗

meta.prompt: woman, huge breasts, exposure, perfect nipples, breast press, closed mouth, casual, (clothing | clothingstyle | clothingstate), (color | very long hair), (color | eyes), perspective, skindentation, freckles, lewd, gorgeous eyes, wearing contacts, stormy landscape, cosmic plane, masterpiece, high quality, highres
